name: Broccoli Rabe With Italian Sausage
recipeYield: Four servings as a main course
keywords: broccoli rabe, italian sausage, red pepper flakes, side dish, spring, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds hot or sweet Italian sausage, cut across into 1-inch thick pieces
1 pound broccoli rabe, trimmed and cut across into 1-inch pieces
3/4 teaspoon crushed red-pepper flakes, if using sweet sausage
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the sausage in a 9-inch pie plate, and cover with a paper towel. Cook at 100 percent power in a high-power oven for 11 minutes. Remove from oven and uncover. Pour off liquid and set aside.

Place the broccoli rabe in a 14-by-9-by-2-inch oval dish. Toss with the olive oil and red-pepper flakes, if using. Cover tightly with microwave plastic wrap. Cook for 8 minutes. Prick plastic to release steam.
Remove from oven and uncover. Stir in salt, pepper and cooked sausage. Serve alone or over cooked pasta.
